name: Oil Tanker Tycoon
description:
Drive the powerful oil tanker & enjoy the oil transport cargo truck driving experience!

Oil Tanker Transport Tycoon 2018 comes with the extreme fun of oil tanker parking and driving simulation. Be a good driver & transport the oil from station to station on time. This is up to you to fulfill the oil need of city stations. Your ultimate duty is to make sure continuous oil supply to fuel stations. Purchase oil & sell it to oil stations. Watch out! Don’t crash & burn up because its highly flammable gasoline oil so be careful!

Earn coins by selling oil to stations & upgrade your tanker to meet the target soon & oil supply on time. Its not only a free oil tanker driving simulation game in this you have to buy, sell & transport oil, meet the targets, earn coins & upgrade your tanker last but not the least continuous supply of oil is the main duty of yours. Make an Oil Tanker Transport Tycoon in your city with on time & efficient supply.

So get ready to challenge yourself to become an expert driver of this heavy fuel transporter truck.

Oil Tanker Tycoon Features:
• Different camera angels to explore 3D city environment
• Heavy oil tanker driving experience with variety of tankers
• High HD graphics with amazing game play
• A unique concept of oil selling, buying & transporting to stations
• Exciting levels with gradually increasing difficulty
• Easy & Fun to play with smooth controls
